taskTextSource:
In this game, you have to focus on the COLOR of the center image

Press the left button with your left index finger, if:

Press the right button with your right index finger, if:


Labels in the lower-left and lower-right of the screen will remind you
which hand to use for which COLOR. Ignore the shape words for now.
cueReminderTextSource: The word COLOR will be presented before each image to remind you what to do.

taskTextSource:
In this game, you have to focus on the SHAPE of the center image

Press the left button with your left index finger, if:

Press the right button with your right index finger, if:


Labels in the lower-left and lower-right of the screen will remind you
which hand to use for which SHAPE. Ignore the color words for now.
cueReminderTextSource: The word SHAPE will be presented before each image to remind you what to do.
